## **ðŸ“Œ Overlap of GO Terms across the drugs**

## **ðŸ“Œ Overlap of GO Terms in CX-5461 vs VEH**
```{r Venn1, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, fig.width=10, fig.height=8}
CX_Datasets <- list(
  "CX_0.1_24" = DEG2_GO,
  "CX_0.1_48" = DEG3_GO,
  "CX_0.5_3" = DEG4_GO,
  "CX_0.5_24" = DEG5_GO,
  "CX_0.5_48" = DEG6_GO
)

ggVennDiagram(CX_Datasets, label = "count") +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(size = 16, face = "bold"),
    legend.title = element_text(size = 12, face = "bold"),
    legend.text = element_text(size = 10)
  ) +
  labs(title = "CX-5461 GO Term Overlap")
```
